name: Corinth
summary: HPS Simulations is proud to announce the  release of Campaign Corinth, a John Tiller Game. Campaign Corinth depicts the Mississippi front of the vast Confederate offensive in the Fall of 1862 that culminated in the battle of Corinth. Defending Federal gains in Mississippi and West Tennessee are Federal Generals Ulysses S. Grant and William S. Rosecrans. Their opponents, Confederate Generals Earl Van Dorn and Sterling Price, have dreams of planting their banners on the banks of the Ohio River.
info:
• 开发: HPS Simulations
  • 游戏类型: Strategy
  • 售价: $49.95
